channel.title: Posts on hi
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on hi

item.title: r/cringetopia
item.description: Hi, having busy days while making darker, red-er rooms. using marker and clear sticky tape using post-it and it’s like this! but… money can do better job. (phillips hue ricebowl series) paying home loan… (never ends) taking picture of dead animal my favourite ni-hao tee I can’t wait til i can talk about this pandemic secret gentlemen’s society!

item.title: Mirror Mirror On The Wall
item.description: I’ve been taking a lot of girls' pictures and I have reached a conclusion that selfies can be more attractive than photos that were taken by another person, when it comes to sex worker’s profile pictures. Of course, hiring a professional with a proper setting is different. Let’s say we use the same iPhone X as our only equipment. This, can’t be any worse. Apart from anything (cloth, shoes, angle, lighting etc) She just looks so awkward.

item.title: A Sexual Emergency
item.description: Things you can do(other than sex) during lockdown Buy OneWheel and ride Send me an invitation on Animal Crossing I remember same time of last year, It was lockdown stage 4 though people were horny as usual. Maybe even hornier than ever. Restriction made people crazy, nothing to do so better have sex! Guys looked for sex workers even during WW2 soâ€¦ donâ€™t worry too much about having blueballs, If thereâ€™s a will, thereâ€™s a way.

item.title: Medication Journal 2
item.description: It’s been half a year after I wrote Medication journal (1) and the medication still is wearing off. I, at last, started the magic day of the month for the first time in 6 months, but I still lactate only ever so slightly when I squeeze my blueberries hard enough. I stumbled upon watching a documentary1 and tv series2 about trauma recently. It’s a huge progress that I could finish an hour of documentary film and 10 episodes of tv series.

item.title: Dirty Tricks
item.description: Recently, strange things are happening and I hope itâ€™s only a coincidence. No. 5 WeChat was blocked 3 times in 4 weeks because we apparently violated user rules. We only did what other shops do. No. 5 website was taken down from google search result today because the landing page picture was exposing too much body part, We had a naked woman showing her titties pic on our first page last year and had zero problems.

item.title: Rhodes
item.description: Hello diabetes… Machi machi Rhodes finally opened last week. Bengong is still my number one for brown sugar pearl milk tea though I like machi machi’s panna cotta series too. I waited 45 minutes to get 2 bottles of it when machi just opened at Sydney city, I was displeased at first but I thought it’s worth to wait after I had a sip. lol Not only Bengong’s and Machi-machi, there are some good eats in Rhodes:

item.title: Ugly
item.description: I want to punch people in their jaw sometimes, especially those cowards, keyboard warriors. I was doing my work routine, checking reviews, update website and so on and I found out a customer calls out a working girl ugly only because she’s not his cup of tea whereas other people still think She’s cutiepie. I mean… is it ok to describe a human as ugly? Some people might think it’s ok because working girls are there to be judged.

item.title: Nintendo Switch, Sex Chair
item.description: Got nintendo switch for late bday present, I am not complaining butâ€¦ I donâ€™t have friends to play mariokart together ok Presents that i got a lot Powerbanks/ portable chargers Gaming stuffs Nintendo wii Nintendo ds Nintendo switch I understand why people give me batteries but what about nintendos, do I look like PokÃ©mon trainer? Last Saturday I went out 3 times to just ride OW.

item.title: Birthday, Blogging
item.description: It has been a year after I refused to write. People still mention about my blog, even people who never knew about it started asking me, “I heard that you had a blog before…” Blogging was fun, The funniest part was that it makes me feel like I’m worthwhile. It is fascinating that someone spends their own time to read my stories. Some of them even try to interact with me because they find me interesting from what I write.

item.title: Medication Journal
item.description: My first schizo episode was July 2020, and I had to stay in the hospital for more than two weeks. It was ok. Fun people around, interesting activities, free meals and snacks, could order uber-eats sometimes, visitors brought me a lot of sweets. The only problem was a single bed. Very very smol bed. I start my antipsychotic drug journey with Olanzapine. It was great. Although I slept 20 hours a day, I was zombie-like while awake, but I stopped seeing or hearing things.
